Articles.Content: I have a ghost ship orbiting in my map view  It's in a perfect orbit, something I haven;t achieved yet. It has the same name as the ship I'm trying to get into orbit and it dhows the ship as landed. I have no idea how to get rid of it,
First, rename your ship to avoid any issues with it.  Then go into the tracking station and select the rogue ship.  You should be able to terminate from there.
Is it maybe something left over from an orbital rescue mission?
Scarecrow's suggedtion took care of it.  Thanks
